content: **crocheted christmas hat / long hat for children in drops babymerino the piece is worked bottom up with stripes theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern bm-036-bn yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 2 - 3/5 - 6/9 - 10/12 - 13/14 years fits head-size 48/50 - 50/52 - 52/54 - 54/56 - 56/57 cm length approx 60-65-70-75-80 cm **yarn** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-100-100-150 g colour 16 red 100-100-100-100-100 g colour 02 off white and use drops snow from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 50 g colour 01 off white **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 24 treble crochets in width and 13 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
